summary: Const property not respected without collapse properties or in IDE mdoe

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Compile the following: --- var a = {}; /** @const */ a.FOO = 1; a.FOO = 2; --- What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Warning about assignment to const. Instead no warning is generated. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? jscomp-debug Please provide any additional information below.

I spoke to Nick, the issue here is a "debug" build without collapse_property and renaming.  The "CheckConst" pass only works with variables and without collapse properties, misses these.  We should always use types information for constant checking and get rid of the existing "CheckConst" pass.
Issue tracking has been migrated to github. Please make any further comments on this issue through https://github.com/google/closure-compiler/issues
